title: Intro: 2 Cool 4 Skool
lyrics:
[방탄소년단 "Born Singer" ft. dj friz 가사]
[Verse: RM]
(We're now going to progress to some steps
Which are a bit more difficult
Ready, set, and begin)
BigHit exclusive, exclusive
DJ Friz
Who's that?
B, A, N, G, T, A, N
B, A, N, G, T, A, N
방탄소년단 What?
(Do it)
2 Cool, 2 Cool 4 Skool
2 Cool, 2 Cool 4 Skool
10대 20대
대신해 쉽게 우리 얘길해
You take that
2 Cool, 2 Cool 4 Skool
2 Cool, 2 Cool 4 Skool
10대 20대
대신해 쉽게 우리 얘길해
You take that
